scripts.create-app: rm -rf ./app && node ../cli/bin init --name=app --backend=sqlite version=workspace:* && cd app && pnpm i --no-frozen-lockfile
scripts.import-database: cp ./database.sqlite ./app/database.sqlite && cd app && node ../../cli/bin import sqlite --database=database.sqlite
scripts.dev: pnpm create-app && pnpm import-database && pnpm start-server
